meanings.sent1: His baldness was noticeable from a distance.

meanings.definition: The state of having little or no hair on the scalp.
meanings.sent1: Her baldness was due to a medical condition.
meanings.sent2: The baldness on his head made him feel self-conscious.
meanings.sent3: The baldness of the cat made it look like a tiny lion.
meanings.sent4: The baldness of the field after the harvest was a stark sight.
meanings.sent5: The baldness of the mountain peak was a majestic sight against the sky.
